nodes.text: Captain Bythen Forral was a male Human veteran of the Clone Wars who moved from flying fighters to teaching the next generation of Imperial cadets. He taught at Vensenor Flight Academy and was known to encourage nonstandard solutions to problems. He had the largest amount of students defect to the Rebel Alliance, but was not an active supporter of the Rebellion.
The Vensenor Academy allowed him to use a Corellian corvette known as the Gallant, as long as he used it for at least three months every year to tour the Empire and train recruit new cadets.
